Name: 剑侠传说
About the game: Swordsman legend is a 2D horizontal version of the action game. Players in the game to play the role of chivalry, need to defeat the men in black, escape. Operation: W, A, S, D move, J attack/Block, K sprint/jump. Game features: the game uses a special art implementation, making the game with better art features. Although the game is simple, but more difficult. No matter the game scene left or right, can not go to the end. Game background: whether it is the background of the protagonist, or the protagonist and the enemy of the hostile relationship, the need for players to imagine.
Developers: 小不点儿儿游戏工作室
Publishers: 小不点儿儿游戏工作室
